overview: When steamy group sex is on the verge of spinning out of control and there's no telling what may happen next, you've got a Clusterfuck! It happens spontaneously when Hall-of-Fame director Steve Cruz, blends the right combination of testosterone, pheromones, sexual chemistry, muscle and sweat to generate some of the most intense action you've ever seen in Clusterfuck! 1.  Clusterfuck! 1 lets loose a series of unstoppable and uninhibited exchanges that will leave you wondering what hit you and have you cummin back for more.
title: Clusterfuck! 1
